## About the Project

<p>How does regional tourism activity influence visitation patterns at US national parks?</p>
<p>Are there certain patterns of these parks?</p>
<p>My project utilise a K-means clustering analysis method to categorise U.S national parks.</p>
<p>National Park Visitation Data and State Tourism Data are wrangled and processed to gain insights.</p>
